Chapter Thirty-Six - Specific Funds for Welfare Work

     Christians to Act as God's Treasurers.--The poor are God's heritage. Christ has given His life for them. He calls upon those whom He has appointed to act as His stewards, to give liberally of the means entrusted to them to relieve the poor and to support His work in the earth. The Lord is rich in resources. He has appointed men to act as His treasurers in this world. That which He has given them they are to use in his service.--Manuscript 146, 1903.
